title: LivehouseVR
subtitle: A VRChat World for DJ Performance and Musical Experience
description: A livehouse performance supported by a physical DJ controller that enables simultaneous control of both Rekordbox and virtual DJ setup in VRChat by sending MIDI data, it also provides a rich array of facilities and functionalities.

title: MapCraft
subtitle: Geographic Information Graphics Web Editor for Visual Analysis
description: A web application provides customized geo-info-graphics generation on different source data, encoding method, projections and map representations.

title: Grasp Point-Cloud Selection
subtitle: Grasp Selection for Point Cloud in Immersive Environment (VR)
description: A gesture-based point cloud selection system to enable intuitive and efficient identification of target clusters in an immersive VR environment.

title: Data Cubes in Hand
subtitle: Multiple Cube Tracking and Data Transmission
description: A Qt window program for cube identifying and tracking based on OpenCV and Hamming Codes, establishing the wireless communication between camera devices and HoloLens.

title: 3DStoryline
subtitle: Immersive Visual Storyline
description: A VR program for visualizing 3DStoryline from encoded story in Excel.

title: Tangible Virtual Reality Cube
description: An Arduino Cube device capable of recording position, posture and surface pressure, for selecting objects according to the pressure  when gripping the device in VR environment.

title: Visual Storytelling for Medical Data
description: A Qt & VTK based interactive visualization system for medical data that provides flag on rendered volume, state preservation and history tracking.
